title: Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons               Operating Hours & Seasons      Operating Hours Visitor Center HoursSummer Hours: (Memorial Day through Labor Day) 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. dailyOff-Season Hours: 8 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. daily (closed on federal holidays in winter)The Monument and Preserve is open every day of the year, 24 hours a day. Winter snows usually prevent automobile access around the Loop Road from mid-November through mid-March.   Â        North Crater Cinder Cone and a lone Limber Pine NPS  Seasons:  Every season has its own special qualities. Find out what the park is like at other times of the year.
